pageContext.claim: “Wow, but not surprisingly, ObamaCare was just ruled UNCONSTITUTIONAL by a highly respected judge in Texas. Great news for America!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump celebrated the outcome of a lawsuit even though it went further than the government had requested. The judge unexpectedly overturned the entire Affordable Care Act, not just the section on preexisting conditions. Refusing to defend the law already was a flip-flop from Trump's pledge to retain protections for people with existing health conditions. Few legal expect believe the ruling will survive the appeal process.
